oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Formal Synthesis of the Human Rhinovirus 3C Protease Inhibitor (-)-Thysanone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MULAY, SV
GHOLAP, SP
FERNANDES, RA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 3C-PROTEASE INHIBITOR
ENANTIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
STEREOSELECTIVE-SYNTHESIS
ANNULATION STRATEGY
(+)-NOCARDIONE B
NATURAL-PRODUCTS
DEOXY ANALOGS
IN-VITRO
THYSANONE
CLEAVAGE
Dotz benzannulation
human rhinovirus 3C protease
oxa-Pictet-Spengler reaction
pyranonaphthoquinones
(-)-thysanone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A strategy based on Dotz benzannulation and an oxa-Pictet-Spengler reaction toward the formal synthesis of a human rhinovirus (HRV) 3C protease inhibitor, the pyranonaphthoquinone (-)-thysanone, is presented.
